prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with striking feathers and a fierce gaze.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that has a majestic wingspan and vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies grace as it soars through the skies.
Give me a Pokemon inspired by real-life birds, featuring unique markings.
Generate a competitive flying-type Pokemon known for its speed and agility.
Show me an elegant Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats.
Make a Pokemon that is a master of aerial combat and has a bright plumage.
